titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "Lights On Afterschool, a national celebration of after-school programs.
Supporting the goals and ideals of "Lights On Afterschool, a national celebration of after-school programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Mr. Porter moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 809.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
Supports the goals and ideals of "Lights On Afterschool!," a national celebration of afterschool programs.
Requests that the President issue a proclamation calling on the communities of the Nation to engage in innovative afterschool programs and activities that ensure the doors stay open and the lights stay on for all children after school.
